DOC.brief_summary: we evaluate the presence of OSA in patients that have a computed tomography (CT) of the chest to rule out pulmonary embolism (PE) to determine if OSA constitutes an independent risk factor for PE.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Obstructive Sleep Apnea as a Risk Factor for Pulmonary Embolism
DOC.criteria: male and female patients age 18 years and older with suspected PE
DOC.keyword: male and female patients suspected of having a pulmonary embolism.
